use_case_name: View Traffic and Environmental Heat Maps
context_of_use: This use case allows a regular user to view traffic and environmental heat maps to analyze data effectively.
stakeholders_and_interests: regular user: Wants to access visual data to make informed decisions.
system administrators: Require accurate data representation for user satisfaction.
description: Allows a regular user to view traffic and environmental heat maps for data analysis.
triggering_event: Regular user requests to view heat maps.
preconditions: The regular user is logged into the system.
The system has available traffic and environmental data.
postconditions: The regular user successfully views the traffic and environmental heat maps.
The system displays the maps accurately based on the latest data.
assumptions: The regular user has the necessary permissions to view the maps.
The system is capable of retrieving and displaying the required data.
requirements_met: The system shall allow regular users to view traffic heat maps.
The system shall allow regular users to view environmental heat maps.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of data displayed in the heat maps.
main_flow: 1. Regular user requests to view heat maps → System retrieves the latest traffic and environmental data.
2. Regular user selects the type of heat map to view → System displays the selected heat map.
3. Regular user analyzes the displayed heat map → System provides interactive features for further analysis.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If there is no available data, the system informs the regular user that no data is available for display.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the heat map fails to load, the system notifies the regular user of the failure and suggests retrying.
